findings.title: Owner can transfer ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to transfer ownership.

findings.title: Owner can update duration time
findings.description: The contract owner has the capability to update the duration time.

findings.title: Owner can update duration reward
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to update the duration reward.

findings.title: Owner can exempt/unexempt a user
findings.description: The owner has the capability to exempt or unexempt a user.

findings.title: Owner can exempt/unexempt a token
findings.description: The owner has the capability to exempt or unexempt a token, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can take tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to withdraw tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot block user
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block a user.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contact
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract cannot mint new tokens after the initial deployment.
